Posts.Content: Ahh sorry to hear that, hope you feel better soon. It shakes you up doesn't it? Chill this afternoon and do something you enjoy xx
Posts.Title: went flying...

Posts.Content: The cursor as for some reason gone crazy so please read this para last I hope you are all ok and have lots of good support where you are. Hi Dreamthief and everyone, Thank you for the warm welcome. I'm 44, diagnosed with Stage 2, invasive lobular carcinoma, left breast, er and pr positive and HER2- in November. Had mastectomy on 15th December and further results to come on 12th Jan. Feeling ok, just can't wait to get this dressing off tomorrow, its so unpleasant and im sure I'll feel much better when I feel cleaner. Yes, im pretty much known as the mad cat woman, love them!!! ‚ù§
